    yappstore/docs

    Yapp Store Developer Documentation

    Create, build and distribute AI Applications with ease with The Yapp Store

    Getting Started About yappstore.ai © Yapp

    In a nutshell... ¶

    • Cross-Platform

      We build your applications for use across MacOS, Windows and Linux - ensuring your apps can be used by the most amount of people.

    • Monetization

      No taking a massive cut of your revenue. You sell your applications, and reap the rewards. We just take a humble fee for providing the service

      Note: monetization will be rolled out in later releases.

    • Developer Focused

      We believe developers shouldn't be boxed into a single platform or technology paradigm. We don't limit you to a specific UI format like a generic interface type - build your application how you want it to look!

    • Native API

      AI applications can be very powerful when they have access to the right resources. The Yapp Store API allows your apps to interact with the users machine

    • Secure

      We handle the security aspects of distribution so you don't have to. All bundled applications are maintained in a sandboxed environment by default.

    • Free to use

      Publishing applications is free - allowing you, the developer, to minimize costs. Using yappstore is free, ensuring no barrier to entry for your potential customers

    Subscribers ¶

    $0.00 / month
    with 0 subscribers
    After all fees*
    at a price of $ a month
    The Yapp Store only charges an 9% platform fee + processing fees
    Note: this is just an estimate - we will update when monetization is rolled out
